ComicInfo.Title: Samurai Jack and the Bear Trap!
ComicInfo.Summary:
“Samurai Jack and the Bear Trap”! SNAP! That’s the sound of a bear trap closing on the leg of Samurai Jack. As Jack tries to get free, hunters descend—but is he the only one they’re hunting?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Adam Bryce Thomas | 1 | B | Cover B | Gavin Fullerton | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Kei Zama (a) & Josh Burcham (c) | 3 |
